policy.title: PRIVACY POLICY

introduction.title: 1. INTRODUCTION
introduction.content: Welcome to Finance 44 application ("App"), a personal finance management tool. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal data when using our App.
introduction.important: IMPORTANT: All data entered into the App is stored exclusively on your device. The App does not transmit data to any external servers or share it with third parties.

dataController.title: 2. DATA CONTROLLER
dataController.content: The data controller is Finance 44, based in Poland.

dataTypes.title: 3. TYPES OF DATA COLLECTED
dataTypes.intro: Our App collects the following types of data:
items: Transaction data (amount, category, date, time, description)

processingPurposes.title: 4. DATA PROCESSING PURPOSES
processingPurposes.intro: We process your data for the following purposes:
items: Storing information about your transactions and financial accounts
Categorizing and analyzing expenses and income

legalBasis.title: 5. LEGAL BASIS FOR PROCESSING
legalBasis.intro: The legal basis for processing your data is:
items: Performance of a contract (providing services within the App)
Legitimate interest of the controller (improving App functionality)

retention.title: 6. DATA RETENTION PERIOD
items: Execution of the "Delete all data" operation available in the App settings

storage.title: 7. DATA STORAGE LOCATION
storage.content: All data is stored locally on your device in an SQLite database file (finance44.db). The App does not create cloud backups or synchronize data with remote servers. Data is not transmitted to remote servers or shared with third parties unless you decide to export the data yourself.

rights.title: 8. YOUR RIGHTS
rights.intro: As a user, you have the right to:
items: Access your data (through the App interface)
Correct data (edit data in the App)
Delete data (using the "Delete all data" function in settings)
Export data (using the "Export data" function in settings)

security.title: 9. DATA SECURITY
security.intro: We apply appropriate technical measures to protect your data, including:
items: Storing all data exclusively on your device
No automatic data transmission to external servers

changes.title: 10. CHANGES TO THE PRIVACY POLICY
changes.content: We reserve the right to make changes to the Privacy Policy. We will inform you of any changes through App updates or notifications in the App.

contact.title: 11. CONTACT
contact.content: For questions regarding the Privacy Policy, please contact the Finance 44 team.

policy.confirmation: By using the App, you confirm that you have read this Privacy Policy and accept its terms.
